bib_record.title: Post-neutron mass chain yield distribution in the thermal neutron induced fission of 229Th

free_txt: 80 cm3 detector connected to a PC based 4096
The resolution of the detector system was 2.0 keV at
dead time of the detector system (<10%)
For short-lived fission products, nitrate solutions
of 229Th (~ 10 ug) sealed in polypropylene tubes were
irradiated in the reactor CIRUS for 60 s to 10 min
using pneumatic carrier facility at a flux of 5 x
targets of 229Th (~ 100 ug) covered with 0.025 mm thick
aluminum foils were irradiated in the reactor APSARA
for 25 min to 7 h at a flux of 1.2 x 10**12 n/cm2/sec
63.7 min in the article is a typo (H.Naik, 2020-07-03)
No information on the source of uncertainty
